guides.title: Use Privacy Checkup
guides.description: Review and update your privacy settings using Facebook's guided tool.

steps.title: Open Facebook Settings
steps.instruction: Tap the menu icon (three lines) and select 'Settings & Privacy'.

steps.title: Start Privacy Checkup
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Privacy Checkup' to begin the guided review process.

steps.title: Review Each Section
steps.instruction: Go through each section: Who can see what you share, How to keep your account secure, and more.

steps.title: Apply Changes
steps.instruction: Review and confirm your privacy preferences for each category.

guides.title: Control Who Can Find You
guides.description: Manage who can find your Facebook profile using your email or phone number.

steps.title: Open Privacy Settings
steps.instruction: Go to Settings & Privacy > Settings > Privacy.

steps.title: Control Search Settings
steps.instruction: Under 'How people find and contact you', adjust who can look you up using your email or phone.

steps.title: Limit Search Engine Indexing
steps.instruction: Toggle off 'Do you want search engines outside of Facebook to link to your profile?'

guides.title: Block Someone
guides.description: Block specific users to prevent them from seeing your profile or contacting you.

steps.title: Visit Their Profile
steps.instruction: Go to the profile of the person you want to block.

steps.title: Open Options Menu
steps.instruction: Tap the three dots on their profile.

steps.title: Select Block
steps.instruction: Tap 'Block' and confirm. You can also manage blocked users in Settings > Blocking.

guides.title: Manage Device Permissions
guides.description: Control what device permissions Facebook has access to.

steps.title: Open App Permissions
steps.instruction: On mobile, go to your device Settings > Apps > Facebook.

steps.title: Review Permissions
steps.instruction: Check permissions like Camera, Microphone, Location, Photos, and Contacts.

steps.title: Disable Unnecessary Access
steps.instruction: Turn off any permissions you don't want Facebook to have.

guides.title: Change Your Password
guides.description: Update your Facebook password to maintain account security.

steps.title: Open Security Settings
steps.instruction: Go to Settings & Privacy > Settings > Password and security.

steps.title: Select Change Password
steps.instruction: Tap on 'Change password'.

steps.title: Enter New Password
steps.instruction: Enter your current password, then your new password twice. Use a strong, unique password.

steps.title: Save Changes
steps.instruction: Tap 'Save changes' to update your password.

guides.title: Control Post Visibility
guides.description: Manage who can see your Facebook posts and past content.

steps.title: Set Default Audience
steps.instruction: Go to Settings > Privacy > Who can see your future posts.

steps.title: Choose Audience
steps.instruction: Select 'Public', 'Friends', 'Friends except...', 'Specific friends', or 'Only me'.

steps.title: Limit Past Posts
steps.instruction: Use 'Limit past posts' to change all public posts to Friends only.

guides.title: Manage Notification Settings
guides.description: Control what notifications you receive from Facebook.

steps.title: Open Notification Settings
steps.instruction: Go to Settings & Privacy > Settings > Notifications.

steps.title: Customize by Type
steps.instruction: Choose which notifications you want to receive for each category (Posts, Comments, Messages, etc.).

steps.title: Adjust Push Notifications
steps.instruction: Control push notifications on mobile by tapping 'Push' and adjusting settings.

guides.title: Control Ad Preferences
guides.description: Manage how Facebook uses your data for advertising.

steps.title: Open Ad Settings
steps.instruction: Navigate to Settings & Privacy > Settings > Ad preferences.

steps.title: Review Ad Topics
steps.instruction: See topics Facebook thinks you're interested in and hide irrelevant ones.

steps.title: Manage Advertisers
steps.instruction: View and hide ads from specific advertisers who have your contact info.

steps.title: Adjust Ad Settings
steps.instruction: Turn off 'Ads based on data from partners' and 'Ads based on your activity' if desired.

guides.title: Lock Your Profile
guides.description: Lock your profile to add an extra layer of privacy (available in some regions).

steps.title: Go to Your Profile
steps.instruction: Tap on your profile picture to visit your profile page.

steps.title: Find Lock Profile Option
steps.instruction: Tap the three dots menu and look for 'Lock profile' option.

steps.title: Enable Profile Lock
steps.instruction: Tap 'Lock your profile' and confirm. Non-friends won't be able to see your photos or posts on your timeline.
